page.title: 09POPULATION OF TADLEY (AGE)
page.content: Statistics for the population of the Tadley area broken down by age and sex were made available to the writer. These figures and statistics based on the 1981 Census have been used in this report. In this area 22.4% of the population are under 16, 66.4% are between 16 and retirement age and 11.2% are over retirement age. The comparative national figure are: 22.2%, 59.9% and 17.9% respectively, indicating that the Tadley area has a younger than average population, indeed 65% of the population is under 40. At around the ages of 60-65 there is a dramatic fall in the population, due not to a high death rate but rather showing that Tadley is a place where people live while working but that they retire elsewhere. In the rural area the proportion of older people seems to be somewhat higher.
